topLevelInfo.text: the slot the block belongs to in the beacon chain
the ID of the validator proposing the block
the hash of the preceding block
the root hash of the state object
an object containing the bulk of the block, divided into several fields

blockBody.text: a value used to select the next block proposer
arbitrary data used to tag blocks
list of validators to be slashed for proposing multiple conflicting blocks to one slot
list of validators to be slashed for attesting to conflicting information
list of attestations in favor of current block
list of new deposits to the depost contract
list of validators exiting the network
subset of validators used to serve light clients
transactions passed from the execution client

attestations.text: a list of which validators participated in this attestation
a container with multiple subfields relating to the attestation
aggregate signature of all attesting validators
